title: how do I link my outlook contacts to my Pixel
content: My old android phone had contacts from multiple sources.  My new pixel seems to only have contacts that were in my gmail account linked to the phone.  How can I get my outlook/hotmail contacts into my new phone?  I already added the hotmail account and can read my emails, but the contacts did not link.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
